summary: Tested native touch-swipe gestures on Banner Carousel and Media Player components. All tests passed: Both components correctly respond to swipe left (next) and swipe right (prev) gestures on mobile viewport (375x812). Button navigation (prev/next arrows, dots) also working correctly on both components.
passed_tests: Desktop: Media Player prev/next buttons work (on hover)
Mobile (375x812): Banner Carousel swipe LEFT advances to next slide (index 0→1)
Mobile (375x812): Banner Carousel swipe RIGHT goes to previous slide (index 1→0)
Mobile (375x812): Media Player swipe LEFT advances to next item (index 1→2)
Mobile (375x812): Media Player swipe RIGHT goes to previous item (index 2→1)
Media Player counter shows X/7 format
critical_code_review_comments: BannerCarousel.jsx: Touch handlers correctly implemented at lines 76-84 using useRef for touchStartX and useCallback for handlers
BannerCarousel.jsx: Swipe threshold of 50px is appropriate (diff > 50 triggers nav)
MediaPlayer.jsx: Touch handlers correctly implemented at lines 96-104 with same pattern as BannerCarousel
Both components use the same reliable pattern: touchstart stores clientX, touchend compares diff, if |diff| > 50 then navigate
data-testid attributes present: banner-carousel, banner-prev, banner-next, banner-dot-{n}, media-player, media-prev, media-next

seed_data_used.banner_carousel: Uses DEFAULT_BANNERS array with 3+ text/image banners (fallback content)
seed_data_used.media_player: Uses DEFAULT_MEDIA_ITEMS with 4 images (PinPanClub Training Day, Kids Learning Together, etc.)

mocked_apis.note: Components fetch from /api/showcase/banners and /api/showcase/media-player but fallback to DEFAULT content if API returns empty/error

context_for_next_testing_agent: Touch swipe gestures tested and working on both BannerCarousel and MediaPlayer. Swipe left = next, swipe right = prev. Threshold is 50px. Use mobile viewport 375x812 for swipe tests. Both components have reliable data-testid attributes.
